My Games

Kirby's latest 3D adventure, filled with new abilities and a post-apocalyptic world to explore.

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

A fast-paced action game where Samus faces off against deadly enemies in a dangerous world.

An open-world Zelda game with a huge world to explore, filled with puzzles and epic battles.

A hack-and-slash game set 100 years before the events of Breath of the Wild, featuring epic battles.

A platforming game where players can create and share their own custom Mario levels.

Splatoon

A colorful team-based shooter where players use ink to claim territory and defeat opponents.

Year: 2015

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Wii U
